ingredients: ¾ cup lentils, wash and soak for atleast half an hour
a generous pinch of asafetida (omit to make gluten-free)
1 to 2 hot green chilies, finely chopped
¾ cup onion finely chopped (about ½ of a large onion)
¼ to ½ tsp cayenne (or add later to preference)
¾ to 1 tsp salt or to preference
